full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA SDUD PA MCHAN DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @034B MCHAN BU 'DI NI, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES SNGAR RANG LO NYER BZHI PA LA DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS SU CHOS GRVA 'GRIM BZHIN PA'I SKABS MDO RGYAS PA RNAMS DANG RGYAN SBYOR TSUL THAD KA RE TZAM DES THUB KYANG CHA TSANG BLOR MI 'JIGS PAS, RGYUN GYI GSHAR SPYAD LA SDUD PA DANG SBYAR NA BDE BAR 'DUG SNYAM NAS SKABS BZHI PA'I PHYED YIN BRIS KYANG, GRVA SKOR GYIS DUS GTUGS PAS PO TI GZHAN RNAMS 'DZIN SKYOR DANG, SO SO'I MCHAN DANG BSDUS DON GSAR DU BRI RGYU SOGS KYIS 'PHRO CAN DU LUS PA, AA MCHOG DGON GYI LAM RIM KHRI PA LHAG BSAM RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA 'JAM DBYANGS PHUN TSOGS @035A *, ,KYIS STOD CHA'I RIM PA PAR DU BSGRUBS TE MJUG CHA TSANG BA BYED DGOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA BZHIN GRUB PAR BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,AOm SVA STVI, ,RGYAL BA'I DBANG PO MNYAM MED SH'AKYA'I TOG ,RGYAL YUM GZHUNG LAM 'BRAS BU'I SHER PHYIN GSUM, ,RGYAL SRAS BYANG SEMS NYAN RANG 'PHAGS TSOGS DANG, ,RGYAL BSTAN GSAL MDZAD BSHES GNYEN RNAMS LA 'DUD, ,THUB PA'I GSUNG RAB KUN GYI RAB DANG PHUL, ,SHER MDO'I NYID KHU SDUD PA MCHAN BCAS 'DI, ,MKHAS MANG BLO GSAL KUN DGA' CHOS GLING DU, ,DGE SLONG RTA MGRIN SKYABS KYIS PAR DU BSGRUBS, ,'DIR 'BAD LAS BYUNG RNAM DAR DGE TSOGS MTHUS, ,BSTAN 'DZIN MCHOG RNAMS BSKAL BRGYAR ZHABS BRTAN CING, ,RGYAL BSTAN PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS GYUR TE, ,'GRO KUN SANGS RGYAS GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG ,'BREL THOGS KUN KYANG TSE RABS 'PHRENG BA RU, ,BSHES GNYEN BSTEN DANG SHER PHYIN 'TSOL BA LA, ,RTAG TU NGU DANG NOR BZANG LTAR 'GYUR NAS, ,RGYAL BA'I DAM CHOS MA LUS 'DZIN PAR SHOG ,KHYAD PAR RGYAL YUM TZINDA MA nI 'DI, ,SKAL LDAN DAD GUS RGYAL MTSAN RTZER MCHOD PAS, ,SKYE DGU'I PHAN BDE'I CHAR BA 'BEBS BZHIN PAR, ,'JIG RTEN KHAMS 'DIR YUN RING GNAS PAR SHOG , ,,)
